cats.Name: Gray Grizzly
cats.Personality: Keeps his distance except for when he's hungry, then he'll stand behind you and meow until you leave! Sometimes can be found in a tree. Is visually impaired.

cats.Name: Scout
cats.Pattern: Brown Tabby with White on Face
cats.Personality: Shy boy

cats.Name: Pluto
cats.Personality: Can occasionally be seen roaming

cats.Name: Simba
cats.Pattern: Orange Tabby with White under Chin
cats.Personality: Partially deaf and usually stays in the bushes, but recognizes feeders and waits for them. Sometimes is very chatty.

cats.Name: Snickers
cats.Personality: Moved from Crow to keep Simba company in his lonely old age. Is finnicky and runs from people.

cats.Name: Tiffany
cats.Personality: Waits for feeders, tries to trip them, sometimes tolerates petting

cats.Name: Torti Mama
cats.Personality: Not always seen, but occasionally follows feeders. Usually does not allow petting.

cats.Name: Shyla
cats.Personality: Doesn't mind people but is mostly interested in the food.

cats.Name: Garfield
cats.Personality: Enjoys sunning on the shelters.

cats.Name: Finn
cats.Personality: Elusive!

cats.Name: Ringo
cats.Pattern: Long Hair Brownish Gray Tabby with White Bib
cats.Personality: Elusive!

cats.Name: Sammy
cats.Personality: Often waits for pets and snacks on top of a pillar, but also roams.

cats.Name: Pereza
cats.Personality: Enjoys sunning on the shelters. Was a momma.

cats.Name: Laura Phi
cats.Personality: Mostly comes out at night.

cats.Name: Precious
cats.Personality: Runs up to feeders and demands chin scratches! Very snuggly with Sassy.

cats.Name: Tiger
cats.Personality: Generally keeps his distance but will approach for food.

cats.Name: Sassy
cats.Personality: Runs up to feeders and demands chin scratches! Very snuggly with Precious.

cats.Name: Amal
cats.Personality: The most elusive of the Dawson-Dyer clan, but is typically very chatty when she does come out.

cats.Name: Damien
cats.Personality: Likes to wander around the science buildings, the grassy area outside Airline Garage, and hide in bushes.

cats.Name: Skeeter
cats.Personality: Believed to have passed away, but then returned after several months of no appearances! We're still confused.

cats.Name: Legend
cats.Personality: Elusive!

cats.Name: London
cats.Personality: Elusive!

cats.Name: Liberty
cats.Personality: Elusive!

cats.Name: Lola
cats.Personality: Elusive!

cats.Name: Mona
cats.Personality: Is fairly territorial and even asserts her dominance at other stations.

cats.Name: Rousseau
cats.Personality: Elusive!

cats.Name: Dewey
cats.Pattern: Gray & White Long Hair Tux with White Feet
cats.Personality: Elusive!

cats.Name: Tails
cats.Personality: Outgoing and friendly! Loves to lounge under the big tree!
